abstract: Mexican police arrest Zetas gang leader and drug kingpin Omar Trevino Morales in suburb of Monterrey, Mexico.
lead_paragraph: Omar Treviño Morales, a drug kingpin known as Z-42, became the latest cartel leader captured in an aggressive campaign by the Mexican authorities.

headline.main: Zetas Leader Is Arrested in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Drug Gang’s Leader Is Arrested

snippet: Omar Treviño Morales, a drug kingpin known as Z-42, became the latest cartel leader captured in an aggressive campaign by the Mexican authorities.
